item.title: Access Okta APIs through httpie and jq
item.description: Table of Contents Pre-requisite Access Okta APIs through HTTPie Using jq to process JSON response Access multiple Okta tenants using sessions in HTTPie Most of us use Postman as the tool to access APIs. As someone who likes cli(command line interface), when I was exploring HTTP clients I found HTTPie (pronounced as aitch-tee-tee-pie) and Jq. Jq is a JSON processor that allows user to retrieve certain records or name-value pairs from it.
